actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of certain committee prints with changes of the Select Committee on Population of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Directs the printing of additional copies of the following revised committee prints for the use of the Select Committee on Population: (1) 1,500 copies of "World Population: Myths and Realities"; (2) 1,500 copies of "Fertility and Contraception in the United States"; (3) 1,000 copies of "Legal and Illegal Immigration to the United States"; (4) 1,500 copies of "Population and Development Assistance;" and (5) 1,500 copies of "Domestic Consequences of United States Population Change."

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of certain committee prints with changes of the Select Committee on Population of the House of Representatives.
